description:
Overview

It's 8:24am, you slept through your alarms. Again. Being late for school one more time means failure of your module. Time to gather everything you need as quickly as possible and leave the house to make sure you get to school on time.

Controls

Move the Mouse Around the Screen to Look for Items of Interest

Type in Keywords into the Text Box 

M to open a Map of the House

Mechanics

Move your mouse around to find items of interest and keywords to figure out what to key into the text box. Use this to clear the three required goals in order to leave the house before the time runs out.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project 824 was developed over the span of 6 weeks as part of my "Programming 1 : Basic Game Programming" Module
